thread.title: Media General to Buy Meredith Corp. for $2.4 Billion
thread.title_full: Media General to Buy Meredith Corp. for $2.4 Billion - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Media General to Buy Meredith Corp. for $2.4 Billion
text:
Television-station owner Media General Inc. on Tuesday said it agreed to buy magazine publisher Meredith Corp. for about $2.4 billion in cash and stock.
The offer of $51.53 a share is a 12% premium to Meredithâ€™s closing price on Friday. Including debt, the...
